text: A Girl Named Tamiko is a 1962 American romantic drama movie directed by John Sturges and was based on the novel of the same name by Ronald Kirkbride. It stars Laurence Harvey, France Nuyen, Martha Hyer, Gary Merrill and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1962 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Sturges Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Japan
title: A Girl Named Tamiko
